i never sleep in.
i like movies based on comedies.

participant_2.background:
I'm the oldest, so I often feel like I need to take care of my younger siblings.
I'm having a hard time waking up in the morning, but I'm enjoying my mystery novel.
I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot.
I want to change my look to reflect my new single status.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

content.text: Not much, just reading a mystery novel. How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm grilling a lot of meat for my family this weekend.
That sounds delicious! I love meat.
Me too! I never sleep in, so I'm up early getting everything ready.
I'm having a hard time waking up in the morning, but I'm enjoying my mystery novel.
It's about a woman who is trying to find her missing husband.
Me too! I'm also doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure he's proud of you.
Thanks. I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.
That sounds like a good idea. I love to sew too!
Me too! I'm thinking about changing my look to reflect my new single status.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure you'll look great.
